snippet: The PEN American Center adds its voice to mounting international criticism of the government of President Ilham Aliyev over human rights abuses and the suppression of free speech.
abstract: PEN American Center will bestow press freedom award on jailed Azerbaijani journalist Khadija Ismayilova, joining growing chorus of criticism over abuses by Azerbaijani Pres Ilham Aliyev; Ismayilova reported on corruption in Aliyev's family.
lead_paragraph: The PEN American Center adds its voice to mounting international criticism of the government of President Ilham Aliyev over human rights abuses and the suppression of free speech.

headline.main: Jailed Azerbaijani Journalist, Khadija Ismayilova, to Be Honored by PEN
headline.print_headline: Jailed Azerbaijani to Get Press Freedom Award

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
